GameConsole.View

类 PhaseView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.View.PhaseView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PhaseView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is the GUI for the Phase View Panel, showing the current phase of conquest game and current player
